IntegerParameter.Description: Smoothing coefficient to adapt current gain value to target gain value. Algorithm applied : gain_value_ = target_gain_value_*smoothing_factor + (1 - smoothing_factor)*gain_value_. Can be set between 0x7FFF (= 1 -> no smoothing) and 0xF (= 2e-12 -> slowest convergence to target gain).
IntegerParameter.Name: smoothing_factor

FixedPointParameter.Description: New gain value. This new target gain will be valid only if its value is between min_gain and max_gain.
FixedPointParameter.Name: target_gain
